titleStmt.title: A compleat course of chymistry containing near three hundred operations ... : also, the structure of several furnaces with near three hundred characters, which are dispers'd in chymical authors, and such instruments by George Wilson ...
titleStmt.author: Wilson, George, b. 1631 or 2.

biblFull.extent: [16], 358, [23] p., [6] leaves of plates : ill., charts
